official_title: A bill to amend the Truth in Lending Act to require lenders to post current interest rates charged for various categories of loans to consumers.

summary.text: Amends the Truth in Lending Act to require creditors to post signs in clear and conspicuous language stating current interest rates charged for each category of loan made to customers.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Truth in Lending Act to require lenders to post current interest rates charged for various categories of loans to consumers.
